Stack,

I created 3 use cases here:

http://www.cs.odu.edu/~fmccown/heritrix/use_cases.html

The parts in red are where someone more experienced than me should 
probably complete the sections.  Any edits you'd like to make are fine 
by me.  I image there are many other common use cases, and maybe some on 
this list would like to offer theirs if they think it would be useful.

Thanks,
Frank


Michael Stack wrote:
> 
> Doc. can go in up to the second before release. I'd say end-of-this
> week, start-of-next should see release of 1.10.0 unless we trip over the
> unexpected.
> 
> Good on you Frank,
> St.Ack
>
